jcr:content.jcr:title: List of political parties in the Gambia

contentheadline.headline: List of political parties in the Gambia

contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of Gambia}} This article lists '''[[political party|political parties]] in [[politics of Gambia|Gambia]]'''. Gambia is a [[one party dominant state]] with the [[Alliance for Patriotic Reorientation and Construction]] in power. Opposition parties are allowed, but are widely considered to have no real chance of gaining power. In 2005 five opposition parties, virtually the entire political opposition in the country, formed a common umbrella called the [[National Alliance for Democracy and Development]]. ==The parties== ===Present parties=== * [[Alliance for Patriotic Reorientation and Construction]] - ruling * [[National Alliance for Democracy and Development]] ** [[National Democratic Action Movement]] ** [[National Reconciliation Party]] ** [[People's Democratic Organisation for Independence and Socialism]] ** [[People's Progressive Party (Gambia)|People's Progressive Party]] ** [[United Democratic Party (Gambia)|United Democratic Party]] * [[Gambia Party for Democracy and Progress]] * [[National Convention Party (Gambia)|National Convention Party]] ===Possible defunct parties=== * [[Gambian People's Party]] ==See also== * [[List of political parties by country]] {{Gambian political parties}} {{Africa in topic|List of political parties in}} [[Category:Lists of political parties|Gambia]] [[Category:Political parties in the Gambia| ]] [[Category:Gambia politics-related lists|Political parties]] [[Category:Lists of organisations based in the Gambia|Political parties]]
